scripts.start: rimraf dist && npm run tsc && copyfiles config.json dist && cross-env ENV=prod node dist/server.js
scripts.start:local: rimraf dist && npm run tsc && copyfiles config.json dist && cross-env ENV=test node dist/server.js
scripts.stress-test: rimraf dist && npm run tsc && copyfiles config.json dist && concurrently "cross-env ENV=test E2E=true node dist/server.js" "node dist/1v1/tests/client-stress-testing.js"
scripts.stress-test:ci: rimraf dist && npm run tsc && copyfiles config.json dist && concurrently "cross-env ENV=test LOGS=none E2E=true node dist/server.js" "node dist/1v1/tests/client-stress-testing.js"
scripts.all-tests:ci: npm run stress-test:ci && npm run test:ci
